strapiPost.title: Celebrate Fall During Ozarktober In Downtown Springdale
strapiPost.content:
Catch some great fall vibes in Downtown Springdale all month during the 6th annual Ozarktober, a celebration of fall in the Ozarks including live music, halloween & haunted train rides, a bonfire, and brews. 

  • Itâ€™s getting lit: This Friday, Oct 14, join the community for a free bonfire event at Shiloh Square from 6-9p and enjoy fire pits for s'mores, live music, and activities for kids. 
  • All aboard: Sunday, Oct 16, the Mountains & Mimosas Train Brunch will roll down the Arkansas Missouri Railroad while passengers enjoy a multi-course meal and entertainment all while taking in the scenic views of the Ozarks. 

You can find tickets and a schedule of the various Ozarktober events HERE.
